com.mambu.apisdk.services

Class ClientsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mambu.apisdk.services.ClientsService

  • public class ClientsService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class which handles API operations like getting and creating clients and groups of clients
    Author:
    ipenciuc

      • getClients

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.clients.shared.model.Client> getClients(boolean active,
                                                                        java.lang.Integer offset,
                                                                        java.lang.Integer limit)
                                                                 throws MambuApiException
        Requests a list of clients, limited by offset/limit
        Parameters:
        active - True if active Clients should retrieved, false for inactive Clients
        offset - Offset to start loading Clients, has to be >= 0 if not null. If null, Mambu default will be used
        limit - Limit of Clients to load, has to be > 0 if not null. If null, Mambu default will be used
        Returns:
        the list of Mambu clients
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • createClient

        public com.mambu.clients.shared.model.ClientExpanded createClient(com.mambu.clients.shared.model.ClientExpanded clientDetails)
                                                           throws MambuApiException
        Create a new client (expanded) using ClientExpanded object and sending it as a JSON api. This API allows creating Client with more details, including creating custom fields.
        Parameters:
        clientDetails - The encodedKey for the clientExpanded object must be null to create a new client
        Returns:
        clientDetails for the newly created client.
        Throws:
        MambuApiException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • updateClient

        public com.mambu.clients.shared.model.ClientExpanded updateClient(com.mambu.clients.shared.model.ClientExpanded clientDetails)
                                                           throws MambuApiException
        Update an existent client (expanded) using ClientExpanded object and send it as a JSON api. This API allows updating Client with new details, including modifying client details, custom fields, address, contacts and document IDs Note: Available since Mambu 3.4
        Parameters:
        clientDetails - client details to be updated. See MBU-3603 for full details. The encodedKey for the clientExpanded object must be NOT null to update an existent client. Client ID and Client Assignment are not modifiable
        Returns:
        updated clientDetails
        Throws:
        MambuApiException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • patchClientState

        public boolean patchClientState(java.lang.String clientId,
                                com.mambu.clients.shared.model.ClientState clientState)
                         throws MambuApiException
        Convenience method to Patch client state
        Parameters:
        clientId - the id or the encoded key of a client. Must not be null
        clientState - new client state. Must not be null. Allowed states: BLACKLISTED, REJECTED, EXITED, INACTIVE (approved), PENDING_APPROVAL (undo approval). See MBU-11443 for more details
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • patchClient

        public boolean patchClient(com.mambu.clients.shared.model.Client client)
                    throws MambuApiException
        Patch client fields
        Parameters:
        client - client. Must not be null and client's encoded key or its id must not be null. As of Mambu 4.1 the following fields can be patched: id, clientRoleId, firstName, lastName, middleName, homePhone, mobilePhone1, birthDate, emailAddress, gender, state, notes, preferredLanguage
        Returns:
        true if client was updated successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • deleteClient

        public boolean deleteClient(java.lang.String clientId)
                     throws MambuApiException
        Delete Client. Note, clients which have open accounts, have assigned tasks, or are assigned to groups, to linked custom fields or are guarantors cannot be deleted. Requires "Delete Clients" permission
        Parameters:
        clientId - client id or encoded key. Must not be null
        Returns:
        status returns true if client was deleted successfully
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • createGroup

        public com.mambu.clients.shared.model.GroupExpanded createGroup(com.mambu.clients.shared.model.GroupExpanded groupDetails)
                                                         throws MambuApiException
        Create a new group using GroupExpanded object and sending it as a JSON api. This API allows creating a new Group with group details, group members, group roles, custom fields, and group address Available since Mambu 3.8.10. See MBU-7336
        Parameters:
        groupDetails - The encodedKey for the groupDetails must be null to create a new group
        Returns:
        group details for the newly created group
        Throws:
        MambuApiException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • updateGroup

        public com.mambu.clients.shared.model.GroupExpanded updateGroup(com.mambu.clients.shared.model.GroupExpanded groupDetails)
                                                         throws MambuApiException
        Update an existent group using GroupExpanded object and send it as a JSON api. This API allows updating Group with new details, including modifying group details, group members, group roles, custom fields and group address
        Parameters:
        groupDetails - group details to be updated. The encodedKey for the groupDetails object must be NOT null to update an existent group.
        Returns:
        updated group details
        Throws:
        MambuApiException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getClientsByBranchCentreOfficerState

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.clients.shared.model.Client> getClientsByBranchCentreOfficerState(java.lang.String branchId,
                                                                                                  java.lang.String centreId,
                                                                                                  java.lang.String creditOfficerUserName,
                                                                                                  java.lang.String clientState,
                                                                                                  java.lang.String offset,
                                                                                                  java.lang.String limit)
                                                                                           throws MambuApiException
        Get Clients by branch id, centre id, credit officer, clientState
        Parameters:
        branchId - the ID of the Client's branch
        centreId - The ID of the centre to which the loan accounts are assigned to. If both branchId and centreId are provided then this centre must be assigned to the branchId
        creditOfficerUserName - the username of the credit officer to whom the CLients are assigned to
        clientState - the desired state of a Client to filter on (eg: ACTIVE)
        offset - pagination offset. If not null it must be an integer greater or equal to zero
        limit - pagination limit. If not null it must be an integer greater than zero
        Returns:
        the list of Clients matching these parameters
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getClientsByBranchOfficerState

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.clients.shared.model.Client> getClientsByBranchOfficerState(java.lang.String branchId,
                                                                                            java.lang.String creditOfficerUserName,
                                                                                            java.lang.String clientState,
                                                                                            java.lang.String offset,
                                                                                            java.lang.String limit)
                                                                                     throws MambuApiException
        Get Clients by branch id, credit officer, clientState
        Parameters:
        branchId - the ID of the Client's branch
        creditOfficerUserName - the username of the credit officer to whom the CLients are assigned to
        clientState - the desired state of a Client to filter on (eg: ACTIVE)
        offset - pagination offset. If not null it must be an integer greater or equal to zero
        limit - pagination limit. If not null it must be an integer greater than zero
        Returns:
        the list of Clients matching these parameters
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

                                                                        java.lang.String limit)
                                                                 throws MambuApiException
        Get clients by specifying filter constraints
        Parameters:

        limit - pagination limit. If not null it must be an integer greater than zero
        Returns:
        list of clients matching filter constraint
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getGroupsByBranchCentreOfficer

        public java.util.List<com.mambu.clients.shared.model.Group> getGroupsByBranchCentreOfficer(java.lang.String branchId,
                                                                                           java.lang.String centreId,
                                                                                           java.lang.String creditOfficerUserName,
                                                                                           java.lang.String offset,
                                                                                           java.lang.String limit)
                                                                                    throws MambuApiException
        Get Groups by branch id, credit officer
        Parameters:
        branchId - the ID of the Group's branch
        centreId - The ID of the centre to which the loan accounts are assigned to. If both branchId and centreId are provided then this centre must be assigned to the branchId
        creditOfficerUserName - the username of the credit officer to whom the Groups are assigned to
        offset - pagination offset. If not null it must be an integer greater or equal to zero
        limit - pagination limit. If not null it must be an integer greater than zero
        Returns:
        the list of Groups matching these parameters
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

                                                                              throws MambuApiException
        Get Groups by branch id, credit officer
        Parameters:

        creditOfficerUserName - the username of the credit officer to whom the Groups are assigned to
        offset - pagination offset. If not null it must be an integer greater or equal to zero
        limit - pagination limit. If not null it must be an integer greater than zero
        Returns:
        the list of Groups matching these parameters
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • patchGroup

        public boolean patchGroup(com.mambu.clients.shared.model.Group group)
                   throws MambuApiException
        Patch Group fields.
        Parameters:
        group - the Group to be patched. The Group and its encoded key or id must not be Null.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the patch was successful
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • patchGroup

        public boolean patchGroup(com.mambu.clients.shared.model.GroupExpanded groupExpanded)
                   throws MambuApiException
        Patches Group fields through GroupExpanded. Pay attention, only the group information gets patched, the other properties on the GroupExpanded like group members and group roles are replaced if they are supplied.
        Parameters:
        groupExpanded - the GroupExpanded to be patched. The GroupExpanded and its encoded key or id must not be null.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the patch was successful
        Throws:
        MambuApiException
